body_html: I don't have an idea of the actual issue here, but as far as I know the immediate data is transmitted in network byte-order. You should use wr.imm_data = htonl(val) and imm_data = ntohl(wc.imm_data) to store and load the immediate data.
body_text: I don't have an idea of the actual issue here, but as far as I know the immediate data is transmitted in network byte-order. You should use wr.imm_data = htonl(val) and imm_data = ntohl(wc.imm_data) to store and load the immediate data.
body: I don't have an idea of the actual issue here, but as far as I know the immediate data is transmitted in network byte-order. You should use `wr.imm_data = htonl(val)` and `imm_data = ntohl(wc.imm_data)` to store and load the immediate data.
